text: Welcome, brave adventurer! Our world is in peril, and we need your swift action.
The magical tree that sustains our land is dying. We must gather the scattered yellow orbs of essence to save it, and time is of the essence!
Your quest is urgent: Collect all the yellow orbs scattered across the map as quickly as possible. You have a limited time to complete this crucial task.
Remember, speed is key. The faster you gather the orbs, the better chance we have of saving our world. Are you ready to begin this race against time?

responses.text: Yes, I'm ready to start the challenge!
Can you explain the mission again?

text: Excellent! The fate of our world rests in your hands. Move swiftly, collect all yellow orbs, and may speed be your ally. Your time starts now!
Good luck, adventurer! The clock is ticking. Go forth and save our world!
